member.name: T:IvanAkcheurov.NClassify.Distribution`1
member.remarks: Implementation of is not strict as cannot contain more than int.MaxValue numbers.

member.name: P:IvanAkcheurov.NClassify.IDistribution`1.DistinctRepresentedEvents
member.summary: Distinct events represented (noise events are not included)

member.name: P:IvanAkcheurov.NClassify.IDistribution`1.DistinctRepresentedEventsCount
member.summary: Total count of distinct events represented (noise events are not included)

member.name: P:IvanAkcheurov.NClassify.IDistribution`1.DistinctEventsCountWithNoise
member.summary: Count of all distinct events including those that have been considered as noise and have no representative

member.name: P:IvanAkcheurov.NClassify.IDistribution`1.DistinctNoiseEventsCount
member.summary: Count of distinct events that have been considered as noise and have no representative ( returns 0)

member.name: P:IvanAkcheurov.NClassify.IDistribution`1.TotalRepresentedEventCount
member.summary: Total count of events (including repetitions) that are represented in the distribution ( returns value > 0)

member.name: P:IvanAkcheurov.NClassify.IDistribution`1.TotalEventCountWithNoise
member.summary: Total count of all events (including repetitions) including those that have been considered as noise and have no representative ( returns 0)

member.name: P:IvanAkcheurov.NClassify.IDistribution`1.TotalNoiseEventsCount
member.summary: Total count of events (including repetitions) that have been considered as noise and have no representative ( returns 0)

member.name: M:IvanAkcheurov.NClassify.IModifiableDistribution`1.AddNoise(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Adds noise to the distribution (unrepresented items that effect frequency and TotalCount values)
member.param: total count of events (including repetitions) that are considered as noise
count of distinct events that are considered as noise and have not been seen by this distribution ever before (it's a burden of a client of the function to guarantee this)

member.name: T:IvanAkcheurov.NClassify.KnnMonoCategorizedClassifier`2
member.summary: Finds the most probable label (category) for the item that hasn't been seen before. Given unknown item, finds N the closest known and labeled items. With that information produces the rankings for all labels. Label's rank is calculated as an average distance to its N closest items. Current implementation has N set to infinity.
member.typeparam: known items that have been labeled
